name: Politiken.dk fix
description:
Virker til:
- Politiken.dk
- Politiken.tv
- ibyen.dk
- cover.dk
- wulffmorgenthaler.dk
- Fjerner næsten alle reklamer

Lavet på baggrund af style 2121
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("pol.dk"),
domain("wulffmorgenthaler.dk"),
domain("politiken.dk"),
domain("politiken.tv"),
domain("ibyen.dk"),
domain("cover.dk") {

.poltop {
height: 185px !important; }

#content {
margin: auto !important; }

.monster_banner,
#top-monster,
.google-adsense-header,
.google-adsense-text,
.facebook-outer,
#jzframe,
#ContainerHotels,
.hr-black,
#politiken_140x100,
.annonce-txt,
.annonce_textads,
.annonce-txt + div,
*[background*="akamai"],
*[action*="adtech"],
*[src*="akamai"],
*[src*="adtech"],
*[src*="advertising"],
*[src*="googlesyndication"],
*[src*="doubleclick"],
*[src*="googleads"],
*[src*="adform"],
*[src*="bluestreak"],
*[src*="adaction"],

*[id*="ADFBannerPlace"],
*[id*="ADFExpand"],
*[id*="pol_stog"],
iframe[id*="coverIframe"],
#hotels_banner,
.ad-bline,
.ad-f-monster,
.ad-noline,
.ad-sp,
.oad-ad,
.ad-sp3-space,
#plus-zone
{display: none !important}

#polHeader {
min-height: 0px !important; }

#top-monster,
.ad-bline,
.ad-text,
.ad-no-space,
.oax-ad,
#leftBanner,
#rightBanner,
#shopLeftBanner,
#newspaperaddbox,
*[src*="liberalalliance.dk/banners"],
*[src*="serving-sys.com"],
*[src*="adform.net"],
*[id*="dst_"],
#comment-complaintbox
{display: none !important}

/* Facebook */
*[src*="facebook.com/plugins/likebox"]
{display: none !important}

}
